program main

    implicit none

    integer :: A, B, result1, amari, n
    integer(8) :: result2, MOD = 1000000007_8
    character(len=20) :: s
    integer(8), allocatable :: dp(:,:)
    integer(8) :: position, nrstSeqStartIndx, startIndex

    ! First part: read A and B, compute result1
    read*, A, B

    result1 = (B-1)/(A-1)
    amari = mod(B-1, A-1)
    if (amari /=0) then
        result1 = result1 +1
    end if

    ! Second part: compute result2 using result1 as position
    position = result1
    nrstSeqStartIndx =1_8

    do while ( getValue(2_8*nrstSeqStartIndx) < position )
        nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx *2_8
    end do

    do while ( getValue(nrstSeqStartIndx +1_8) <= position )
        nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx +1_8
    end do

    startIndex = getValue(nrstSeqStartIndx)
    result2 = (position - startIndex) +1

    ! Third part: process result2 as string
    write(s, '(I0)') result2
    s = adjustl(s)
    n = len_trim(s)

    allocate( dp(0:n-1, 0:12) )

    integer(8) :: base =1_8

    integer :: i, pre, next, next_digit, new_mod
    integer(8) :: contribution

    do i =0, n-1
        character(len=1) :: current_char = s(n -i:i)
        if (current_char == '?') then
            dp(i, :) = 0_8
            do pre =0, 12
                do next =0,9
                    new_mod = mod( base * next + pre, 13 )
                    contribution =0_8
                    if (i ==0) then
                        if (pre ==0) then
                            contribution =1_8
                        else
                            contribution =0_8
                        end if
                    else
                        contribution = dp(i-1, pre)
                    end if
                    dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + contribution
                    dp(i, new_mod) = mod( dp(i, new_mod), MOD )
                end do
            end do
        else
            next_digit = ichar(current_char) - ichar('0')
            dp(i, :) =0_8
            do pre =0,12
                new_mod = mod( base * next_digit + pre, 13 )
                contribution =0_8
                if (i ==0) then
                    if (pre ==0) then
                        contribution =1_8
                    else
                        contribution =0_8
                    end if
                else
                    contribution = dp(i-1, pre)
                end if
                dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + contribution
                dp(i, new_mod) = mod( dp(i, new_mod), MOD )
            end do
        end if
        base = mod( base *10_8, 13 )
    end do

    print*, dp(n-1,5)

    deallocate(dp)

contains

    integer(8) function getValue(index)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: index
        getValue = 1_8 + (index -1_8)*index /2_8
    end function getValue

end program main
